answerText: Winooski River[10] The Winooski River flows into this body of water into which the Alburgh Peninsula juts. The La Chute River connects it with Lake George.
heading: Missiles of October |2011 | 3 | 5 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: This river's environmentally friendly "one" dam was one of the first to be built using fiberoptic technology and features a fish lift to allow salmon to breed upstream.  For 10 points each: [10] Name this river named by the Abenaki Tribe for a word translating as "Wild Onions." It flows through Montpelier and its worst flood, in 1927, caused fifty-five deaths.
